actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to prohibit certain activities in time of war or armed conflict.

summary.text: Prohibits, during time of war or armed conflict, the collecting or disbersing of money or anything of value, directly or indirectly, for the enemies of the United States. Provides for penalties of up to ten years in prison, or a fine of up to $10,000, or both, for anyone who knowingly violates this Act. (Adds 18 U.S.C. 2392)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to prohibit certain activities in time of war or armed conflict.
